page.title: 01Weald Farmland Nr Capel
page.content: Block 05160138 is part of the Weald with a fairly flat landscape covered predominently by rough or intensive grassland, some arable fields and stretches of woodland. Fields surrounded by hedges and trees give a false impression of continuous woodland when viewed from above. The block is primarily farmland with a few living in scattered farms an cottages The permeatedd by a number of public footpaths and bridleways. Apart from the farmers and a minority in local light industry or village amenities, the majority commute by bus, train of car to the surrounding area, nearby towns and London. Road traffic through the village has recently eased with compleation of a by-pass, but airtraffic noise has increased due to greater actiivity of aircraft from Gatwick.
